modName: Explosive Arrows- Fire Frost and Shock
summary: Adds three varieties of exploding arrows, and allows you to craft them at the forge using steel arrows and analogous elemental salts. They strike with enough force to send items flying for hundreds of meters, actors for tens of meters, and are even forceful enough to knock a flying dragon out of the air.
descriptionHtml:
Adds the ability to make area-of-effect, explode-on-hit arrows of fire, ice, and shock varieties. You can make them in batches of 25 at the forge with 25 steel arrows and a fire, frost, or void salt, respectively.

The arrows themselves have very low damage- only 10 damage- but the resulting explosions are very powerful, so a direct hit will almost always be fatal. The farther the hit, the less effect it will have.

They also throw actors and items into the air like ragdolls :D

They\'ll even knock a flying dragon out of the air.

EDIT: Now with an optional file that uses less force for the explosion!

Please endorse if you like them, and I love comments.
author: KyreanNightblood
